title: Cup final [1961]
brief_description: Sporting documentary on the 1961 FA Cup final of Tottenham Hotspurs versus Leicester City at Wembley Stadium. Historical in the sense that Spurs won 2-0 and became the first team in the history of English football to win both the League and Cup double.
